Package applicationServices.services

Interface BankAccountServiceI

All Known Implementing Classes:
BankAccountService
public interface BankAccountServiceI
An interface representing a service for managing bank accounts. This service provides methods for saving, retrieving, and managing bank accounts. It also supports operations such as depositing and withdrawing money from bank accounts.
Author:
Gleb Nickolaenko

  • Method Details

    • save

      BankAccount save(BankAccount bankAccount) throws BaseException
      Saves a bank account in the repository.
      Parameters:
      bankAccount - The bank account to be saved.
      Returns:
      The saved bank account.
      Throws:
      BaseException - If an error occurs during the operation.

    • findAccountById

      BankAccount findAccountById(String id) throws BaseException
      Retrieves a bank account by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the bank account to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The found bank account, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      BaseException - If an error occurs during the operation.

    • withdrawMoney

      boolean withdrawMoney(String bankAccountId, BigDecimal amountString, String transactionId) throws BaseException
      Withdraws a specified amount of money from a bank account.
      Parameters:
      bankAccountId - The ID of the bank account to withdraw money from.
      amountString - The amount to withdraw.
      transactionId - The unique ID of the transaction.
      Returns:
      True if the withdrawal is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      BaseException - If an error occurs during the operation.

    • depositMoney

      boolean depositMoney(String bankAccountId, BigDecimal amountString, String transactionId) throws BaseException
      Deposits a specified amount of money into a bank account.
      Parameters:
      bankAccountId - The ID of the bank account to deposit money into.
      amountString - The amount to deposit.
      transactionId - The unique ID of the transaction.
      Returns:
      True if the deposit is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      BaseException - If an error occurs during the operation.
